original_text: It would be better for him if a millstone were hung around his neck and he were cast into the sea than that he should cause one of these little ones to sin.
korean_text: 그가 이 작은 자 중의 하나를 실족하게 할진대 차라리 연자맷돌이 그 목에 매여 바다에 던져지는 것이 나으리라

sentences.original_text: It would be better for him
if a millstone were hung around his neck
and he were cast into the sea
than that he should cause one of these little ones to sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 어린이들 중 하나를 죄짓게 하는 것보다
